hero.tagline: Your Finger. Your Key. Your Data.
hero.description: Your finger becomes the key to your digital vault. All the information you want to use with AI, always under your biometric control.

features.localProcessing: Your finger is the vault key
features.hybridCloud: Total control over every shared data
features.mobileControl: Manage, edit, remove your knowledge easily

vault.title: Your Digital Vault
vault.subtitle: Everything Under Control
vault.description: Your finger is the only key that can unlock your data. No hacker, no software, no AI can access without your physical consent.

fingerprint.title: Finger = Key
fingerprint.description: Biometric templates encrypted locally, never shared

control.title: Total Control
control.description: Manage every single data in Bolt: add, edit, remove

privacy.title: Absolute Privacy
privacy.description: Automatic TTL, zero persistence, guaranteed deletion

universal.title: Universal AI
universal.description: Works with any AI: ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, custom APIs

cta.headline: Your Finger. Your Key. Your Data.
cta.description: Become the absolute guardian of your digital information. No AI will ever access without your biometric consent.
